songs.title: Po Up and Roll Up
songs.lyrics:
Check it
I  just woke up
You  know what?
It’s time I po up
And roll out
Then  get my ho bitch
To  ho up
Hate it
I  loved it
So what


Hey bitch
I’m stuck in that shit mate
Cause  i’m the captain of the ship mate
I’m really active in the shit mate
Y’all just be riding that shit mate

I’m with the crack
I flip a pack
Sip some yak
Put a bitch on track
I get a stack
Just to spit on track
But you ain’t knowing
About shit like that

You lose a sack
And get right back
They call me the mack
With the Midas touch
I sent a thorough bred
To lap that track
Knowing I was using
The vision till her life is up

Get the paper and go nuts
Every function it go up;
Never, ever we slow up
I just po up and roll out

Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out

Crack the cap
On the activist
Pull up then I mac a bitch
My pimp hand is accurate
Only need to use it
When I smack a bitch

But I’d rather get dope with it
I’ll po up and po with it
Grab the 40 and blow with it
Hit him in the brain
And be slow with it

But I’m a roll up and ho up
Put the dick off in your slot
She was calling you a fag, man
Said she put her finger in your butt
What’s wrong with you new school
Niggas
Take it up the poo poo
Fool fool niggas
It’s time for  a real G to school you
Nigga
Let me teach you how to thug on a
Poo Nigga
True blue nigga
Crip is the gang
We don’t ? nigga
Pain in the brain
Got a loose screw nigga
Only can hang
If you cool with us
We some real niggas

Get the paper
And go nuts
Every function it go up
Never ever will slow up
I just po up and roll out

Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out

Ganking a Caesar
Paying what I deserve
Pull up to the keys-erp
Money in the meter
House where I meet her
Hit her then skeet her
Get  her till I sleep her
Where I meet her
Gank and a Caesar

Paying what I deserve
Pull up to the keys-erp
Money in the meter
House where I meet her
Hit her then skeet her
Get  her till I sleep her
Where I meet her

Get the paper and go nuts
Every ? shit and go up
Never ever will slow up

I just po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
Po up and roll out
